description:
Assisted by Emporio and his friend Weather Forecast, Jolyne rushes to the courtyard to pass Jotaro`s Stand Disc to the Speedwagon Foundation.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Operation Savage Guardian (Head to the Courtyard!) (1)
Savage Garden Sakusen (Nakaniwa e Mukae!) Sono 1
サヴェジ・ガーデン作戦 (中庭へ向かえ!) その①
